name: How much money is left over from shopping?
instruction:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-2-course-5-task-12.png)

After the purchases made at the store, the amount of money available decreased by $48.

Create a `cash` variable with the value `200`.

Write a command that decreases the available value of the `cash` variable by `48`.
